basics.name: Caterina Doglioni
basics.label: Chair in High Energy Physics
basics.summary: Professor of Particle Physics at the University of Manchester. Research focus on Dark Matter, ATLAS, and sustainable AI for fundamental physics.

education.institution: University of Oxford, Merton College, UK
courses: Thesis: Measurement of the inclusive jet cross section with the ATLAS detector at the LHC
PhD fully funded by external grants from UK, Italy and Sweden

Thesis nominated as outstanding contribution, published in Springer Theses series
Full scholarship at the Collegio Universitario Lamaro Pozzani
Winner of INFN scholarship for physics graduates in particle physics (ranked 1st in Italy)
